title: Ep. 37 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer start off this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave by eating Krispy Kreme donuts. They give Russell Peters a call to discuss Hinduism, which Bert is interested in possibly joining. They also discuss how often they brush their teeth, celebrities with fake teeth and fake hair, planking, Trinidad James, and Bert's daily caloric intake. Bert and Nadav also talk out their differences.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
